name: ruby-notify-my-android
tagline: send notifications to Notify My Android application
body:
### Introduction

![NMA logo](https://www.notifymyandroid.com/img/nma_logo.png)

Send notifications to Android devices via the Notify My Android API. Details about the API are available at [https://www.notifymyandroid.com/](https://www.notifymyandroid.com/).

### Install

`gem install ruby-notify-my-android`

### License

MIT

### Authors and Contributors

* Ken Pepple (@slashk)
* Nick Groenen (@zoni)

### Support or Contact

Create an issue on Github at [https://github.com/slashk/ruby-notify-my-android/issues](https://github.com/slashk/ruby-notify-my-android/issues)
